article_title: Salem students eye skyrocketing college costs

article_metadata.author: Doug Ireland direland@eagletribune.com

og.description: SALEM, N.H. — As college tuition rates continue to soar, Congresswoman Ann Kuster and higher education experts gathered Friday at Salem High School to help students and their families prepare
